title: [Highlight] Klay Thompson crosses Allen and throws down the poster
[Highlight] Ja Morant with the incredible two hand block
[Highlight] Klay drains his first three pointer in his return!
[Highlight] Fred VanVleet hits 2 big threes to put the Raptors up, including a logo shot!
[Highlight] Klay starts off hot in the 2nd half!
[Highlight] Steph Curry heats up and drills 3 straight triples
[Highlight] Ja Morant has to move his head to avoid hitting the rim on this dunk
[Highlight] Anthony Edwards contorts and throws it HIGH off the glass for an incredible finish!
